mapper.sql: id, user_id, activity_id, current_price, create_time, update_time, state, qr_code
mapper.insert: insert into user_order (id, user_id, activity_id, current_price, create_time, update_time, state, qr_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user_order
id,
user_id,
activity_id,
current_price,
create_time,
update_time,
state,
qr_code,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{currentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update user_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
current_price = #{currentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_price = #{currentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uo.id,a.enterprise_id as enterpriseId,uo.pick from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1=1 and uo.state=1 and uo.qr_code=#{qr_code}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =1 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}

select uo.id,uo.user_id as userId,uo.pick,a.title as title,a.picture as picture,u.nickname as nickName from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =0 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =0 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =4 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =3 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}

select * from user_order where activity_id = #{aid}
limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
select count(id) from user_order where activity_id = #{aid}
select u.avatarurl from user_order uo left join user u on uo.user_id=u.id where 1=1 and uo.activity_id = #{aid} and (uo.state=1 or uo.state =2)

select uo.id as oid, a.title, a.picture, a.origin_price as originPrice, uo.current_price as currentPrice, a.minu_price as minuPrice, a.cut_time as cutTime, get_helper_num_by_order_id(uo.id) as helperNum from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1=1 and uo.user_id = #{uid} and uo.state = 1
limit #{page.start},#{page.pageSize}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1=1 and uo.user_id = #{uid} and uo.state = 1

select uo.id as oid, get_state_name(uo.state) as stateName, a.title, a.picture, a.activity_time as activityTime, a.cut_time as cutTime, a.origin_price as originPrice, uo.current_price as currentPrice, uo.qr_code as qrCode, get_helper_num_by_order_id(uo.id) as helperNum from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1 = 1 and uo.user_id = #{uid} and uo.state in (2,4)
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1 = 1 and uo.user_id = #{uid} and uo.state in (2,4)

select u.id as uid, uo.id as oid, get_state_name(uo.state) as stateName, a.picture, a.title, uo.current_price as currentPrice, a.origin_price as originPrice, a.minu_price as minuPrice, a.limit_number as limitNumber, a.sold_number as soldNumber, a.consume_time as consumeTime, a. consume_end_time as consumeEndTime, a.activity_time as activityTime, a.cut_time as cutTime, uo.create_time as createTime, uo.qr_code as qrCode from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where uo.id = #{oid}
